title: Jio Financial Services gets nod to raise foreign investment limit to 49%
description: Jio Financial Services Ltd has been granted approval to raise its foreign investment limit to 49%. Foreign investors currently hold 17.55% of the company's shares. The company's net profit fell 6% in the first quarter ending June. Jio Financial introduced new services such as mutual fund loans and auto insurance in July.
